item.title: Improving Code Quality in C# With Static Code Analysis
item.description: Static code analysis helps you build secure, maintainable, and high-quality C# code. In this week's newsletter, we'll explore how to integrate it into your .NET projects. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/improving-code-quality-in-csharp-with-static-code-analysis
